dc_title_s: Democratic Republic of the Congo - Protected Areas (2016)
dc_description_s: The data includes the protected areas national parks, World Heritage Site, reserves in DRC. The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) is a joint project between the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) and the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN), managed by United Nations Environment Programme's World Conservation Monitoring Centre (UNEP-WCMC). The World Bank and the International Finance Corporation, collectively the World Bank Group (WBG) strives to enhance public access to and use of data that can support development impact.
